flavor_text_entries.flavor_text:
被认为会带来灾祸，
而实际上性格很温和。
会向人传递灾害危机的信息。

災いを　もたらすと　いわれるが
実際には　おだやかな　性質。
災害の　危機を　人に　伝える。

Although it’s said to bring disaster, in actuality,
this Pokémon possesses a calm disposition and
warns people of any crises that loom.

Si dice che sia latore di disgrazie. In realtà
ha un carattere molto gentile e avvisa gli esseri
umani di disastri naturali imminenti.

Se rumorea que es portador de calamidades,
pero en realidad tiene un carácter muy dócil.
Alerta a los humanos cuando vienen catástrofes.

Es heißt, Absol sei ein Unheilsbote, doch in
Wahrheit hat es ein sanftes Wesen. Es warnt
die Menschen vor drohenden Katastrophen.

On le dit annonciateur de catastrophes, mais
c’est en fait un Pokémon paisible. Il prévient les
hommes de l’imminence des cataclysmes.

被認為會帶來災禍，
但實際上性格很溫和。
會將災害危機的警訊傳達給人們。

재앙을 가져온다고 전해지지만
실제로는 온화한 성질이다.
재해의 위기를 사람들에게 알린다.

わざわいを　もたらすと　いわれるが
じっさいには　おだやかな　せいしつ。
さいがいの　ききを　ひとに　つたえる。

自然災害を　キャッチする　力を　持つ。
険しい　山岳地帯に　生息し
滅多に　山の　ふもとには　降りてこない。

Absol has the ability to foretell the coming of natural disasters.
It lives in a harsh, rugged mountain environment. This
Pokémon very rarely ventures down from the mountains.

Absol ha l’abilità di predire le catastrofi naturali. Vive negli
ambienti montani più aspri e inospitali. Soltanto raramente
si allontana dalle montagne per avventurarsi a valle.

Absol tiene la habilidad de predecir las catástrofes naturales.
Este Pokémon vive en hábitats montañosos, hostiles y
accidentados de los que rara vez se aleja.

Absol kann bevorstehende Naturkatastrophen voraussagen.
Es lebt auf einem kargen, zerklüfteten Berg. Dieses Pokémon
wagt sich nur sehr selten ins Tal herunter.

Absol a le pouvoir de prédire les catastrophes naturelles.
Il vit dans un milieu montagneux aride et accidenté.
Ce Pokémon s’éloigne très rarement des montagnes.

자연재해를 감지하는 힘을 지녔다.
험한 산악 지대에 서식하며
좀처럼 산기슭에는 내려오지 않는다.

しぜんさいがいを　キャッチする　ちからを　もつ。
けわしい　さんがくちたいに　せいそくし
めったに　やまの　ふもとには　おりてこない。

アブソルが　人前に　現れると　必ず
地震や　津波などの　災害が　起こったので
災いポケモン　という　別名で　呼ばれた。

Every time Absol appears before people, it is followed by a
disaster such as an earthquake or a tidal wave. As a result,
it came to be known as the disaster Pokémon.

Ogni volta che compare Absol, segue un disastro come
un terremoto o un maremoto. Per questo motivo è noto
come il Pokémon dei disastri.

Cada vez que Absol aparece ante la gente, ocurre una
catástrofe natural como un terremoto o un maremoto. Por esta
razón se le conoce como el Pokémon de las catástrofes.

Jedes Mal, wenn Absol sich den Menschen zeigt, endet dies
in einer Katastrophe wie Erdbeben oder Sturmflut. Deswegen
ist es auch als das Desaster-Pokémon bekannt.

Chaque fois qu’Absol apparaît devant des gens,
une catastrophe comme un tremblement de terre
ou un raz-de-marée survient peu de temps après.
Il est devenu tristement célèbre sous l’appellation
de Pokémon désastreux.

앱솔이 사람들 앞에 나타나면 반드시
지진이나 해일 등의 재해가 일어나서
재난포켓몬이라는 별명으로 불렸다.

アブソルが　ひとまえに　あらわれると　かならず
じしんや　つな などの　さいがいが　おこったので
わざわいポケモン　という　べつめいで　よばれた。

災害の　予兆を　感じると
姿を　見せる　ために　災いを　呼ぶ
ポケモンと　誤解されていた。

It appears when it senses an impending natural
disaster. As a result, it was mistaken as a
doom bringer.

Appare quando avverte un imminente disastro
naturale. Ciò ha fatto credere che portasse sfortuna.

Aparece cuando prevé una catástrofe natural
inminente, por eso dicen que trae mala suerte.

Es taucht auf, wenn es spürt, dass eine
Naturkatastrophe kurz bevorsteht. Daher wurde es
irrtümlicherweise für einen Unheilsboten gehalten.

Absol apparaît dès qu’une catastrophe naturelle est
sur le point de se produire. Pour cette raison,
les gens ont longtemps pensé qu’il portait malheur.

재해의 징조를 느끼면 모습을
보이기 때문에 재앙을 부르는
포켓몬으로 오해받고 있었다.

さいがいの　よちょうを　かんじると
すがたを　みせる　ために　わざわいを
よぶ　ポケモンと　ごかいされていた。

災害を　予感する。
危険を　知らせる　ときだけ
人前に　現れるという。

It senses coming disasters and appears before
people only to warn them of impending danger.

Percepisce i disastri naturali imminenti e si mostra
solo per avvertire la gente del pericolo.

Presiente desastres inminentes y se aparece a la gente
para advertir del peligro.

Es spürt drohende Katastrophen und erscheint nur
dann, wenn es andere vor der Gefahr warnen will.

Il pressent les catastrophes et n’apparaît aux gens
que pour les prévenir d’un danger imminent.

재해의 위험을 감지한다.
위험을 알리는 때에만
사람 앞에 나타난다고 한다.

さいがいを　よかんする。
きけんを　しらせる　ときだけ
ひとまえに　あらわれるという。

It appears from deep in the mountains
to warn people about upcoming disasters
it has sensed with its horn.

It appears from deep in the mountains
to warn people about upcoming disasters
it has sensed with its horn.

Rumored to sense disasters with its
horn, it became a target. It fled
deep into the mountains.

La capacité de sa corne à sentir
les catastrophes ayant trop attiré
l’attention sur lui, il vit reclus.

Rumored to sense disasters with its
horn, it became a target. It fled
deep into the mountains.

La capacité de sa corne à sentir
les catastrophes ayant trop attiré
l’attention sur lui, il vit reclus.

It has the ability to foretell
natural disasters. Its life span is
over a hundred years.

It has the ability to foretell
natural disasters. Its life span is
over a hundred years.

Rumored to sense disasters with its
horn, it became a target. It fled
deep into the mountains.

It senses coming disasters and
appears before people only to
warn them of impending danger.

It senses coming disasters and
appears before people only to
warn them of impending danger.

It appears when it senses an impending
natural disaster. As a result, it was
mistaken as a doom-bringer.

It appears when it senses an impending
natural disaster. As a result, it was
mistaken as a doom-bringer.

It sharply senses even subtle changes in
the sky and the land to predict natural
disasters. It is a long-lived POKéMON that
has a life-span of 100 years.

ABSOL has the ability to foretell the
coming of natural disasters.
It lives in a harsh, rugged mountain environment. This POKéMON very rarely
ventures down from the mountains.

Every time ABSOL appears before people,
it is followed by a disaster such as an
earthquake or a tidal wave. As a result, it came to be known as the
disaster POKéMON.
